title: Polio declared a disaster emergency in New York after more poliovirus found
description: The declaration will expand vaccine access and require vaccine data reporting.

title: New Linux malware combines unusual stealth with a full suite of capabilities
description: With polymorphic encoding and a multistage infection chain, Shikitega is hard to detect.

title: Queen Elizabeth II led a low-tech life—but knighted plenty of sci-tech figures
description: An Ars list of technologists and scientists honored by the late Queen Elizabeth II.

title: Nvidia’s flagship AI chip reportedly 4.5x faster than the previous champ
description: Upcoming "Hopper" GPU broke records in its MLPerf debut, according to Nvidia.

title: Star Trek: Khan – Ceti Alpha V will be a prequel to The Wrath of Khan
description: Beloved Wrath of Khan, Undiscovered Country director is at the helm.

title: Ted Cruz blows up Congress’ plan to save journalism by making Big Tech pay up
description: Cruz worries newsrooms and Big Tech would collude to censor content.

title: FCC to fight space debris by requiring satellite disposal in 5 years or less
description: Planned rule for low Earth satellites requires deorbit 5 years after end-of-life.

title: Corsair crams 4 extra keys into an extremely thin wireless mechanical keyboard
description: Extra programmability is a plus, but laptop-height mechanical switches aren't for everyone.

title: Uber exec accused of disguising data-breach extortion as “bug bounty”
description: Security experts: Uber exec "did nothing wrong" by disguising data breach.

title: Android 13 raises minimum system requirement to 2GB of RAM, 16GB of storage
description: Phones that don't meet the minimum requirements won't be eligible to upgrade.

title: Remembering the strange tale of Queen Elizabeth II and the golden Nintendo Wii
description: Gold-plated 2009 marketing stunt is now a $36,000, one-of-a-kind collectible.

title: Why pain feels worse at night
description: New research into the circadian clock helps explain this mystery.

title: Runway teases AI-powered text-to-video editing using written prompts
description: Promotional video suggests future video editing could be as easy as writing a suggestion in a box.

title: Justin Roiland, Shovel Knight devs dish on their trippy new indie games

title: Rocket Report: SLS launch targeted for late September, unique view of Falcon 9
